about_the_game:
Pathfinder(R) for Savage Worlds Companion

The Pathfinder for Savage Worlds Companion contains a host of useful information for players and GMs including details and background information about Golarion, new character options, fiendish evil organizations, and more! This item requires the Pathfinder for Savage Worlds core book. Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
